name: generate_leftover_recipe
description: Turn your leftovers into amazing recipes with three AI chef personas: Jamie Leftover (simple comfort food), Paul Leftovuse (refined technique), or Gordon Leftover-Slay (wild experiments). Choose your chaos level (1-10) and get a recipe that fits your vibe. Includes nutrition info and affiliate links for missing ingredients.

chatgpt_user_id.description: Unique identifier for the ChatGPT user

ingredients.description: List of leftover ingredients you have (e.g., ['chicken', 'rice', 'broccoli'])

trigger_phrases: I have {ingredients} what should I cook
turn my leftovers into a recipe

response_format.chef_commentary: RIGHT! Listen up, you donut! This is how you turn boring leftovers into something SPECTACULAR!

integration_notes.journey_flow: Journey 3 adds fun and virality to LoopGPT. The three chef personas create shareable content that drives word-of-mouth growth. Recipes are designed to be entertaining while still being practical.
integration_notes.chef_selection: Chaos 1-3 = Jamie (warm, encouraging), 4-7 = Paul (precise, technical), 8-10 = Gordon (intense, bold). Each has a distinct personality and recipe style.
integration_notes.leftovergpt_integration: Currently uses mock data. Future integration with LeftoverGPT API will provide AI-generated recipes based on actual ingredient combinations.
integration_notes.affiliate_revenue: Missing ingredients include MealMe affiliate links, generating revenue while helping users complete their recipes.
integration_notes.viral_mechanics: Recipe cards are designed to be shareable on social media, with memorable chef personalities and impressive results.
